title: United States of Cakes
resume: Masterful confectioner Roy Fares takes us on a tantalizing trip to his favorite place in the world when it comes to pastries, desserts and other goodies - California. We follow Roy to his favorite cafes and bakeries in the States and meet people who are all experts in their field. At home in Roy's apartment in Stockholm, he shows how to do a lot of good things inspired by trips to the United States.
